name: Mecha Mechanic
description:
Mecha Mechanic is a game about a mechanic who needs to repair a battle mecha. Although, he needs to fix it... while the mecha IS battling another mecha and taking hurt. Your help is essential to win this battle!

Use the arrows to move, Z to jump and X to use your wrench.
Fix the broken rooms by using the wrench in the ! boxes and by jumping in the pumps.

Developed on the Global Game Jam 2020!

This game is set on the same universe of another game developed on Global Game Jam 2020: Steam Punch.

Credits: Guilherme Antonio de Lima, Guilherme Baroni Marchiori, Mikael Jonas Muller and Wellington Fidalgo Baldo!
